title: Git lab materials
description: Подготовить практикум по базовым операциям Git для студентов и добавить ссылку в набор лабораторных материалов.

title: Lab work numbering
description: Добавить номер лабораторной работы в заголовок ключевого файла lab_materials/lab_work.md для согласованности с UI-проектом.

title: Add issue description examples to beads guide
description: Add a short memo section in lab_materials/beads_guide.md with good/bad examples of issue descriptions.

title: Consolidate root markdown docs
description: Integrate content from situational root MD files into core docs/lab materials and remove obsolete files.

title: Update QUICKSTART and README for current repo
description: Fix repo directory name in clone instructions and remove hardcoded test count.

title: Add issue description memo to student guide
description: Add short memo in docs/student_guide.md with good/bad examples for issue descriptions.

title: Mention beads hooks in lab work
description: Добавить в lab_work.md явную ссылку на связку beads+git с hooks (auto-sync, merge-driver).

title: Document recommended beads mode
description: Add recommended beads auto-sync + hooks + merge-driver guidance to lab_materials/beads_guide.md and AGENTS.md, then verify workflow compliance.

title: Align beads + git workflow with frontend
description: Обновить AGENTS/README/учебные материалы под единый beads+git workflow (hooks, bd sync, формат коммитов) и добавить CNCF workflow файл.

title: Repo name and workflow format update
description: Заменить упоминания локальных имён репозиториев на GitHub-имена, обновить формат заголовка коммита на [ID], зафиксировать правило bd sync=git pull, и задать issue-prefix ergab.

title: Add beads requirements to lab_work
description: Add short best-practice requirement about issue descriptions and recommended beads workflow to lab_materials/lab_work.md and student_guide.md.

title: Document issue descriptions in beads guide
description: Add guidance to use --description when creating issues in lab_materials/beads_guide.md and AGENTS.md.

title: Add beads guide to lab materials
Clarify binary name in QUICKSTART
description: Add note about process name matching Cargo.toml package/bin name for taskkill/pkill.
